In England, in the seven days to 12 February, there were 322,112 new confirmed cases (569.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 February, there were 474,082 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 32% (151,970 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 February is 15,767,071 (27,881.6 cases per 100,000 population).
